005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.tools.cli.core.commands;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.JsonUtil;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.XmlUtil;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.JsonSchemaContentValidator;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.XmlSchemaContentValidator;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.OscalBindingContext;
015
016import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
017
018import java.io.IOException;
019import java.io.InputStream;
020import java.util.LinkedList;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import javax.xml.transform.Source;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027public class ValidateCommand
028    extends AbstractOscalValidationCommand {
029  @Override
030  public String getDescription() {
031    return "Check that the specified OSCAL instance is well-formed and valid to an OSCAL model.";
032  }
033
034  @Override
035  @NonNull
036  public XmlSchemaContentValidator getOscalXmlSchemas() throws IOException, SAXException {
037    List<Source> retval = new LinkedList<>();
038    retval.add(
039        XmlUtil.getStreamSource(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
040            OscalBindingContext.class.getResource("/schema/xml/oscal-complete_schema.xsd"))));
041    return new XmlSchemaContentValidator(CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(retval));
042  }
043
044  @Override
045  @NonNull
046  public JsonSchemaContentValidator getOscalJsonSchema() throws IOException {
047    try (InputStream is = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
048        OscalBindingContext.class.getResourceAsStream("/schema/json/oscal-complete_schema.json"))) {
049      return new JsonSchemaContentValidator(JsonUtil.toJsonObject(is));
050    }
051  }
052}
